name: DNS Capital
activity_description: LaForce, LLC was recently acquired by DNS Capital in partnership with LaForce senior management. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
full_text: LaForce, LLC (LaForce) was recently acquired by DNS Capital (DNS) in partnership with LaForce senior management. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
strategy_insights: DNS Capital focuses on a long-term, flexible investment approach across sectors such as healthcare and technology, balancing control and minority investments.
leadership_changes: Michael A. Pucker serves as CEO, with several other key leadership positions filled by experienced executives in various fields.

name: DNS Capital
activity_headline: IMIDomics Closes $16.5 Million Series A Financing
activity_description: The round was led by DNS Capital with additional investment from Bristol Myers Squibb and others.
full_text: IMIDomicsâ„¢ closes $16.5 million Series A financing to advance its precision discovery platform for immune-mediated inflammatory diseases. The round was led by DNS Capital with additional investment from Bristol Myers Squibb, The Pritzker Organization, Tao Capital and others.
strategy_insights: DNS Capital focuses on a long-term, flexible investment approach across sectors such as healthcare and technology, balancing control and minority investments.

name: DNS Capital
activity_headline: FSG acquires controlling interest in Penguins
activity_description: The deal is subject to approval by the NHL Board of Governors and is expected to close before the end of the year.
full_text: The deal, which is subject to approval by the National Hockey League (NHL) Board of Governors, is expected to close before the end of the year. It marks a significant investment by DNS Capital in the sports sector.
